product_metadata.risk_disclaimer: Investment risk in the investment portfolio is borne by the policyholder.
product_metadata.lock_in_rule: No surrender or withdrawal allowed completely or partially during first 5 policy years.

product_summary.objective: Smart Pension is a retirement-focused ULIP designed to help systematically build a pension corpus with market-linked growth. At vesting, the accumulated fund can be commuted partially and used to purchase an annuity for retirement income.
key_highlights: Variant 2 provides Waiver of Premium (WOP) on death during PPT
Wide fund options including index pension funds
Partial withdrawal allowed only for major life events after lock-in
Fund Additions: Return of Allocation Charges + Loyalty + Vesting Booster
Settlement option for death benefit up to 5 years

plan_variants.death_benefit_structure: Higher of Fund Value or Guaranteed Death Benefit
Guaranteed Death Benefit paid immediately + policy continues with company-funded premiums

core_benefits.details: On survival till vesting date, Fund Value as on vesting date is payable provided premiums are paid and policy is in force.
vesting_use_rules: Use entire corpus to buy annuity (immediate/deferred)
Commute up to 60% corpus and annuitize remainder
Up to 50% of annuity purchase may be from another insurer
core_benefits.minimum_annuity_rule: If proceeds insufficient for minimum annuity, paid as lump sum.

core_benefits.details: Nominee receives higher of Fund Value or Guaranteed Death Benefit.
core_benefits.guaranteed_death_benefit: 105% of Total Premiums Paid including top-ups
core_benefits.termination: Policy terminates on death intimation unless settlement option chosen.

core_benefits.details: Nominee receives Guaranteed Death Benefit immediately. Policy continues till end of term with all future premiums funded by company. At vesting, Fund Value paid to nominee.
core_benefits.mortality_charge_stop: No mortality charges deducted after death

core_benefits.details: Allowed only after completion of 5 years. Maximum 25% Fund Value.
restrictions: Allowed only for IRDAI permitted reasons (education, marriage, house purchase, critical illness, disability, start-up, etc.)

eligibility_and_parameters.maximum_premium: As per Board Approved Underwriting Policy (BAUP)
eligibility_and_parameters.female_advantage: Female Life Assured eligible for age setback of 3 years

charges_structure.mortality_charge: Deducted monthly till death of life assured.

return_of_allocation_charges.details: Total premium allocation charges deducted are added back (excluding GST).

loyalty_additions.rate: 0.25% of average fund value of last 3 years

vesting_booster.rate: 2% of average fund value of last 3 years

available_funds_sample: BSE Dividend Leaders 50 Index Pension Fund

postponement_of_vesting.not_allowed_after_death: Variant 2 nominee cannot change vesting date

settlement_option_death.no_withdrawal_rule: No partial withdrawal during settlement period

compliance_guardrails.pension_ulip_rule: No liquidity allowed for first 5 years under IRDAI ULIP guidelines.
compliance_guardrails.annuity_purchase_rule: At vesting or surrender, corpus must be used for annuity purchase except commutation up to 60%.
compliance_guardrails.suicide_exclusion: Suicide within 12 months → nominee gets Fund Value as on death intimation date.
compliance_guardrails.loan_rule: No loan facility under this plan.
compliance_guardrails.free_look_period: 30 days from receipt of policy document.

retrieval_chunks.text: At vesting, fund value is payable and must be used to buy annuity; up to 60% commutation allowed.
Variant 2 pays Guaranteed Death Benefit immediately and future premiums are waived while corpus continues till vesting.
At end of year 15, all allocation charges deducted are added back to fund value (excluding GST).
Loyalty additions begin from year 16 and vesting booster adds 2% at policy term end.
Withdrawals allowed only after 5 years, max 25%, only 3 times, only for IRDAI permitted retirement reasons.
